title: FOSDEM 2026
description: FOSDEM is a free event for software developers to meet, share ideas and collaborate. It is one of the largest gatherings of Free and Open Source Software developers in the world.

title: ISC High Performance 2026
description: The event for High Performance Computing, Machine Learning, Data Analytics & Quantum Computing.

title: SC26 (Supercomputing 2026)
description: The International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking, Storage, and Analysis.
